sourcesContent:
<template>
    <Sparkline
      :data-items="[dataItem.target]"
      :transitions="false"
      :type="'bar'"
      :series-defaults="seriesDefaults"
    >
      <ChartArea :opacity="0" :width="180" :height="40" />
      <ChartValueAxis>
        <ChartValueAxisItem :max="max" :min="min" />
      </ChartValueAxis>
    </Sparkline>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import {
    Sparkline,
    ChartValueAxis,
    ChartValueAxisItem,
    ChartArea,
  } from "@progress/kendo-vue-charts";
  import "hammerjs";
  
  export default {
    components: {
      Sparkline,
      ChartValueAxis,
      ChartValueAxisItem,
      ChartArea,
    },
    props: {
      dataItem: Object,
    },
    data() {
      return {
        seriesDefaults: {
          labels: {
            background:'none',
            visible: true,
            padding: 3,
            format: "{0}%",
          },
        },
        min: 0,
        max: 100,
      };
    },
  };
  </script>
